notes: This is an example configuration file for cartridge specifications.
Adjust 'pages_per_cartridge' based on your cartridge's rated page yield.
Adjust 'ml_per_cartridge' based on your cartridge's ink volume capacity.
Adjust 'price_per_cartridge' based on your cartridge's actual cost.
When 'ml_per_cartridge' is provided, cost calculation uses actual ink volume (more accurate).
When only 'pages_per_cartridge' is provided, cost calculation uses page yield estimation.
Copy this file and modify it to match your specific cartridge specifications.
